scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.pyramids

Class WarpPyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.pyramids.WarpPyramid

  • public final class WarpPyramid
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent a warp pyramid created by upsampling an 2d array of doubles a series of times.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double[][] originalWarp
      The original warp which is the basis of the pyramid
      private int PYRAMID_LEVELS
      The number of levels of the pyramid
      private java.util.List<double[][]> warpPyramidList
      The pyramid of the warps at each level
      private java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Size> warpSizes
      The associated sizes of the pyramid

    • Constructor Detail

      • WarpPyramid

        public WarpPyramid(@NonNull
                   double[][] warp,
                   @NonNull
                   java.util.List<org.opencv.core.Size> imageSizes)
        Creates an up sampled warp pyramid
        Parameters:
        warp - The original warp that is to be the first level of the pyramid
        imageSizes - The associated sizes of the images which relate to each warp

    • Method Detail

      • createWarpPyramid

        private void createWarpPyramid()
        Creates a new warp pyramid. Loops through each of the associated images sizes and upsamples the warp to image sizes size.

      • getPyramidSize

        public int getPyramidSize()
        Get the size of the warp Pyramid
        Returns:
        the number of levels in the warp pyramid

      • getWarpAtIndex

        public double[][] getWarpAtIndex(int index)
        Gets the warp array from a specified level of the warp pyramid.
        Parameters:
        index - The level of the position of the warp which is required
        Returns:
        The warp array at that level of the pyramid
